amendatorysection.para: In addition to the registration fees for motor vehicles and trailers, the county treasurer or designated county official or his or her agent shall collect:

(1) One dollar and fifty cents for each certificate issued and shall remit one dollar and fifty cents of each additional fee collected to the State Treasurer for credit to the Department of Motor Vehicles Cash Fund;
(2) Fifty cents for each certificate issued and shall remit the fee to the State Treasurer for credit to the Nebraska Emergency Medical System Operations Fund;
(3) One dollar and fifty cents for each certificate issued and shall remit the fee to the State Treasurer for credit to the State Recreation Road Fund; and

(4) For the period January 1, 2003, through December 31, 2005, twenty-five cents for each certificate issued to pay for the costs of the motor vehicle insurance data base created under section 60-3,136 and shall remit such additional fee to the State Treasurer for credit to the Department of Motor Vehicles Cash Fund.
